html: VA is not broken, and it’s not perfect. It provides some of the best veteran care in the country — that's a fact — but red tape and wait times are unacceptable. I’d ask @DrPhilRoe not to tell members to shut their mouth. @AOC represents veterans, just like the rest of us.
text: VA is not broken, and it’s not perfect. It provides some of the best veteran care in the country — that's a fact — but red tape and wait times are unacceptable. I’d ask @DrPhilRoe not to tell members to shut their mouth. @AOC represents veterans, just like the rest of us.

html: Climate change is here + we’ve got a deadline: 12 years left to cut emissions in half. A #GreenNewDeal is our plan for a world and a future worth fighting for. How did we get here? What is at stake? And where are we going? Please watch & share widely pic.twitter.com/RDT7eLgbiZ
text:
Climate change is here + we’ve got a deadline: 12 years left to cut emissions in half.

A #GreenNewDeal is our plan for a world and a future worth fighting for.

How did we get here?
What is at stake?
And where are we going?

Please watch & share widely pic.twitter.com/RDT7eLgbiZ

html: Yesterday during recess @RepJimmyGomez and I did pushups in the committee room to get our heads back in the game I’m watching the video now and @RepRashida is just LAUGHING at us in the background I fell off the workout wagon lately so this was a nice nudge to hop back onpic.twitter.com/iFNCyWXDs8
text:
Yesterday during recess @RepJimmyGomez and I did pushups in the committee room to get our heads back in the game 

I’m watching the video now and @RepRashida is just LAUGHING at us in the background 

I fell off the workout wagon lately so this was a nice nudge to hop back onpic.twitter.com/iFNCyWXDs8

html: I’m not shocked by much. But I felt ill watching GOP Oversight members try to delay subpoenaing DHS+others after multiple unfulfilled requests for info that could lead us to reunify lost children with their parents. Some issues are partisan. The urgency of this shouldn’t be.pic.twitter.com/Y8dtQrG9qj
text:
I’m not shocked by much. But I felt ill watching GOP Oversight members try to delay subpoenaing DHS+others after multiple unfulfilled requests for info that could lead us to reunify lost children with their parents.

Some issues are partisan. The urgency of this shouldn’t be.pic.twitter.com/Y8dtQrG9qj

html: Proud to stand with @SenMarkey and over 60 Original House Cosponsors today to introduce our #GreenNewDeal resolution for both the House AND Senate! You can read the official resolution here: https://ocasio-cortez.house.gov/sites/ocasio-cortez.house.gov/files/Resolution%20on%20a%20Green%20New%20Deal.pdf …pic.twitter.com/sm2uIbYcsr
text:

You can read the official resolution here:
https://ocasio-cortez.house.gov/sites/ocasio-cortez.house.gov/files/Resolution%20on%20a%20Green%20New%20Deal.pdf …pic.twitter.com/sm2uIbYcsr

html: Today was my first hearing on @OversightDems. We heard heartbreaking testimony from Mrs. Worsham, who lost one of her two insulin-dependent daughters because of high prescription drug costs. This is immoral and should not have happened to this family.pic.twitter.com/Cyykn9YZLE
text: Today was my first hearing on @OversightDems. We heard heartbreaking testimony from Mrs. Worsham, who lost one of her two insulin-dependent daughters because of high prescription drug costs. This is immoral and should not have happened to this family.pic.twitter.com/Cyykn9YZLE

html: Today @OversightDems held its first-ever hearing on the skyrocketing costs of prescription drug prices. These new experiences can be a lot to take in, but it’s much easier with @RepCummings’ courageous leadership, our supportive colleagues, & my desk neighbor @AyannaPressleypic.twitter.com/YDBAkRVJMj
text:
Today @OversightDems held its first-ever hearing on the skyrocketing costs of prescription drug prices.

These new experiences can be a lot to take in, but it’s much easier with @RepCummings’ courageous leadership, our supportive colleagues, & my desk neighbor  @AyannaPressleypic.twitter.com/YDBAkRVJMj

html: The post-its outside our office are growing thank you all for your continued support as we navigate and learn in these early days & beyond!pic.twitter.com/Rio49meM7K
text: The post-its outside our office are growing  thank you all for your continued support as we navigate and learn in these early days & beyond!pic.twitter.com/Rio49meM7K

html: Prior to our swearing-in, NY-14 casework was being fwded to @SenGillibrand. Thankful for her office’s continued assistance as we connect with those cases and sort out the large volume of requests we‘re receiving from in + outside the district!
text:
Prior to our swearing-in, NY-14 casework was being fwded to @SenGillibrand. 

Thankful for her office’s continued assistance as we connect with those cases and sort out the large volume of requests we‘re receiving from in + outside the district!

html: We’ve been documenting the buildout on my Congressional Instagram (IG: @ repocasiocortez). In the meantime, we are setting up temporary offices and returning all NY-14 constituent calls.
text:
We’ve been documenting the buildout on my Congressional Instagram (IG: @ repocasiocortez).

In the meantime, we are setting up temporary offices and returning all NY-14 constituent calls.

html: Office update/NYC Rent life: although we attempted to take over our predecessor’s lease, the landlord wanted to almost double rent (from ~$7.8k/mo to $15k/mo). That spike would have meant less caseworkers for our community. Instead, we’re making a new space w/ a family business!pic.twitter.com/PrM8E1v8wh
text:
Office update/NYC Rent life: although we attempted to take over our predecessor’s lease, the landlord wanted to almost double rent (from ~$7.8k/mo to $15k/mo).

That spike would have meant less caseworkers for our community. Instead, we’re making a new space w/ a family business!pic.twitter.com/PrM8E1v8wh

html: We at the House are doing *our* job passing bills reopen government, so why won’t @senatemajldr do his? We left to drop off letters to: - His Sen Majority Leader office - The GOP cloak room - The Senate floor - His Senate office And he’s nowhere to be found. #WheresMitch?pic.twitter.com/jZcWei6PM7
text:
We at the House are doing *our* job passing bills reopen government, so why won’t @senatemajldr do his?

We left to drop off letters to:
- His Sen Majority Leader office
- The GOP cloak room
- The Senate floor
- His Senate office

And he’s nowhere to be found. #WheresMitch?pic.twitter.com/jZcWei6PM7

html: I’ve been getting letters, visits, & calls from workers and everyday Americans like this about the shutdown all week. They’re all saying the same thing: don’t give in, don’t legitimize hostage-taking of our paychecks, & don’t let GOP do this to build a wall Americans don’t want.pic.twitter.com/0GxBiJFVc2
text:
I’ve been getting letters, visits, & calls from workers and everyday Americans like this about the shutdown all week.

They’re all saying the same thing: don’t give in, don’t legitimize hostage-taking of our paychecks, & don’t let GOP do this to build a wall Americans don’t want.pic.twitter.com/0GxBiJFVc2

html: It is a complete injustice that to this day, some American citizens do not have federal representation in government. It’s time for that to change. I am happy to sign on to #HR51 in support of DC statehood.https://twitter.com/DC_Vote/status/1083745022875451393 …
text:
It is a complete injustice that to this day, some American citizens do not have federal representation in government.

It’s time for that to change. I am happy to sign on to #HR51 in support of DC statehood.https://twitter.com/DC_Vote/status/1083745022875451393 …

html: Thank you @townhallproject!https://twitter.com/townhallproject/status/1083797525872570368 …
Great meeting with Congresswoman Ocasio-Cortez! After talking serious issues we lightened it up a bit and talked James Brown. @AOCpic.twitter.com/vNOXBlFGGt
text: Great meeting with Congresswoman Ocasio-Cortez! After talking serious issues we lightened it up a bit and talked James Brown. @AOCpic.twitter.com/vNOXBlFGGt

html: It was an honor of a lifetime to meet with Rev. Jesse Jackson to discuss how we advance the movement for economic and racial justice in the United States. Rev. Jackson’s lifetime of civil rights work paved the way to make lives like mine possible. Thank you, @RevJJackson!https://twitter.com/RevJJackson/status/1083047472958717952 …
text:
It was an honor of a lifetime to meet with Rev. Jesse Jackson to discuss how we advance the movement for economic and racial justice in the United States.

Rev. Jackson’s lifetime of civil rights work paved the way to make lives like mine possible. Thank you, @RevJJackson!https://twitter.com/RevJJackson/status/1083047472958717952 …

html: I just had a furloughed worker come visit me in my office. “I work for HUD,” he said. “My family is hurting now that I’m three weeks without a paycheck,” “but please - please don’t give into a wall. I don’t want the political tool of withholding my paycheck to be legitimized.”
text:
I just had a furloughed worker come visit me in my office.

“I work for HUD,” he said. “My family is hurting now that I’m three weeks without a paycheck,”

“but please - please don’t give into a wall. I don’t want the political tool of withholding my paycheck to be legitimized.”
